original: Na ukkhittako na ca pana pārivāsiko,
analyzed: na ukkhittakaḥ na ca pana pārivāsikaḥ

original: Na saṅghabhinno na ca pana pakkhasaṅkanto;
analyzed: na saṅgha bhinnaḥ na ca pana pakkha saṅkantaḥ

original: Na jīvati na mato na nibbuto,
analyzed: na jīvati na mataḥ na nibbutaḥ
na ca api vācāya pare bhaṇeyya
manasā api santaḥ na kareyya pāpa
vācā giram no ca pare bhaṇeyya
telam madhum phāṇitam ca api sappi
kammam ca tam kuppeyya vagga paccayā
padavī tihāra mattena vācāya bhaṇitena ca

original: Na cāpi ñatti na ca pana kammavācā,
analyzed: na ca api na ca pana kamma vācā
na ca ihi bhikkhu iti jinaḥ avoca
saraṇa gamanam pi na tassa atthi
katam ca kammam su katam bhaveyya
katam ca kammam a katam bhaveyya

original: Na ummattako na ca pana khittacitto;
analyzed: na ummattakaḥ na ca pana khitta cittaḥ

original: Na rattacitto na ca pana theyyacitto,
analyzed: na ratta cittaḥ na ca pana theyya cittaḥ

original: Na cāpi so paraṁ maraṇāya cetayi;
analyzed: na ca api saḥ param maraṇāya
na ca api āraññakam sāsaṅka sammata
na ca api saṅghena sammuti dinnā
a kappa katam na api rajanāya

original: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjaṁ,
analyzed: na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajja
